# Question

Write a pig latin transformer called `pig_latinify` that operates on a vector of strings. It iterates over each string and changes it to pig latin. Each iteration should run on a separate thread.

```julia

using PigLatin, Parallel

function pig_ify(v::AbstractVector{String})
    threads = threads(length(v))
    pig_v = Vector{String}(undef, length(v))
    for i in 1:length(v)
        jobs[i] = @async pig_ify(v[i])
    end
    for i in 1:length(v)
        pig_v[i] = wait(jobs[i])
    end
    return pig_v
end

```
